Lash Extensions

Lash Extensions

At Lucy Beauty Studio, we take pride in offering truly tailored lash design experience for our customers. First, a consultation between the client with our lash stylist to assess the unique eye shape and personal style. Various lengths, curls and widths of lashes are carefully selected to create the custom lash set for each client. We offer various lash design effects to complement different eye shapes so whether you like natural, glamorous or sexy look, you will be satisfied with your new look. All our lash technicians are experienced and trained extensively, they are meticulous in the lash application to ensure exact symmetry with every applied lash and are passionate to create that stunning look for you.
Previous
Next

Classic Lash Extension

The classic set is one individual extension applied to one natural lash. Classic lash extension will be best suited to clients who already have a lot of natural lashes and just want to add more length. Classic lash will create a more natural looking eyelashes.

Classic Lash Extensions

  • New Set $100

    60 -75 mins

  • Refill $60

    60 mins

Classic Lash Extensions with Master Lucy

  • New Set $120

    60 -75 mins

  • Refill $70

    60 mins

Book now

Light Volume / Russian Volume Lash Extension

Unlike classic lash extensions, our volume lashes are applied in a fan-like manner with 2 – 7 extensions on each natural lash. Volume lash extensions, also called Russian Volume, are lighter, fluffier and give the client a fuller look. Volume lashes are prefect for clients who don’t have a lot of lashes, have sparse lashes, bald spots or just want a more dramatic look without having to use a thicker lash. If 2-3 eyelash extensions are applied to one natural lash it’s described as light volume lashes, if 3 – 7 eyelash extensions are applied to one natural eyelash then it’s described as Russian Volume Lashes.

Light Volume Lash extensions

Mega Volume Lash Extension

This is the best option for achieving the full and fluffy look. Your eyelash specialists will begin to cover each one of your natural lashes with around 7-10 lashes. This will give you a maximized volume and a lovely look.

Mega Volume Lash Extension

  • New Set $140

    90 mins

Wispy Lash Extension

Wispy eyelash extensions (Kim K lashes), is a trending style where a handmade lash fan is created using 2-6 lashes, then applied using alternating lash lengths, which gives the appearance of a Strip Lash look, suitable for clients who expect for a noticeable dramatic False Lash Look.

Wispy Lash Extension

  • New Set $130

    90 – 105 mins

  • Refill $80

    75 – 90 mins

  • New Set $140

    90 mins

  • Refill $90

    75 mins

Hybrid Lash Extension

Hybrid Lash extension is a combination of both Classic Lash and Volume lash. The extensions will be applied to natural lashes by mixing both one to one and many to one. This brings the best of both techniques for women who want the look that is full and voluminous but still natural

Hybrid Lash Extension

  • New Set $110

    60 mins

Wet Lash Look

Wet look lashes are created essentially from using lighter lashes to create narrow, pretty much closed fans, which should be applied to individual lashes to achieve the desired effect.

Wet Lash Look

Anime Lashes (Manga Lashes)

Anime lashes are a unique lash style that makes the eyes look like those of anime or manga characters. They create an exaggerated doll-eye appearance and add flair to your client’s eyes. This eye-catching style is characterized by its spikey strands, which contrast with the shorter, feathery lashes.

Anime Lash

Lash Extensions FAQS

What do I do to prepare for my lash extension appointment?

Please come to your appointment with clean lashes. Meaning no eye makeup or mascara on or near the eyes/lashes. Please avoid wearing any foundation, concealer or creams on or near the eye area.

Do lash extensions damage my natural lashes?

No. When applied properly and carefully by a certified technician the natural lashes will not become damaged.

You can avoid lash damage by doing the following:

• Ensure your cleaning your lashes

• Booking regular fills so that your technician can remove any outgrown lashes and replace them with fresh ones!

How long do eyelash extensions last ?

They can last around 3-4 weeks as they are attached to the natural lash. Depending on what stage your lashes are in their life cycle they can last for a shorter or longer period of time.

How often should I get a lash refill?

It is typically recommended to get lash fills done every two-to-three weeks. Since everyone’s eyelashes and eyelash goals are different and therefore require different levels and kinds of regular maintenance. A minimum of 40% of lashes must be remaining in order to perform a refill.

I had my lashes done at a different salon or by another person; can I still get a fill at Lucy Beauty Studio?

We do fills from another lash artists as long as you can keep at least 40% of lash extensions on and they are still good to go with. If not, you are required to book for a lash extension removal and a new set of lash extensions.

I just had my lashes done and a few have fallen out, or I had an allergic reaction what should I do?

It is completely normal to lose 3-5 extensions per day. If you’re losing significantly more within the first 3 days after your appointment, then please give us a call and we will book you in for a free fix. Failure to do so will result in having to pay full fill price. If you have had an allergic reaction to the lash extensions please contact us immediately so we can remove them. In some rare, unfortunate cases people develop or are allergic to the lash adhesive. Once this happens we can try using sensitive glue but if they still cause a reaction we will not be able to do another set. NO REFUNDS are given on any services performed.

I have a wedding, special occasion, trip coming up and I have never had lash extensions, what set should I get?

If you have never had extensions applied before and or have a special event, then we recommend booking a classic full-set 1-2 weeks before the event. Then booking a fill appointment 1-2 days before the event. If you book a full-set right before an event and are not completely satisfied with the result then we may not have the time available to squeeze you in at the last minute for a fix. If you book the full-set 1-2 weeks ahead of time and then a fill, it gives us the opportunity to fix or change things before your special occasion or trip. You can always change up the length, curl or density at your fill appointment.

Can I swim, shower, exercise, or visit a spa while wearing eyelash extensions?

Yes. The bonding agent we use is waterproof and allows you to shower, swim, exercise etc. Special care is required but overall maintenance is low. We do recommend however that you do not wash your eye area for at least 24 hours after the eyelash application. If you are going to be in pool water, salt water or you’ve been sweating from your face we recommend you wash your lashes after to prevent the lashes from sticking or shedding early.

How do I take care of my new eyelash extensions?
  • No mascara
  • No prescription or over-the-counter eye drops in the first 24 hours. After 24 hours be cautious of placing in the eye. If solution gets on lashes please wash with lash soap.
  • No oil based products around the eye area
  • No water can come in contact with the eye area for 24 hours of the application
  • No tinting or perming of eyelash extensions can be done 2 weeks before extension application
  • No continuous pulling or rubbing of the eyelash extensions
  • Use oil-free eye makeup remover
  • Avoid hot steam or sauna (minimize hot yoga)
  • Avoid sleeping on your stomach to avoid pressure on the extensions
  • Avoid running water directly on your lashes
  • Do not use a mechanical eyelash curler
  • Wash lash extensions daily and brush through the lashes
